title: Stuck at logging In, chat problems, and in-game problems.
body:
This bug started yesterday where it took so much time to log in, took so much time to connect to chat services, took so much time to start DQ and get in a queue, and finally, the most troublesome problem, I usually play on 290ms just fine, but now all of a sudden it just says 290ms and gives me insane lag and 5 second delays where you literally can't play the game. 


Any fix? Is it just my PC or servers? 

The messages i send on chat also go late.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing an inconsistent connection to the servers. You can find the most common solutions for this on our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Don't really know but all of a sudden past 2 days There's only one guy online in my friendlist.

the game lags alot still, but its playable again no idea what I did.


Though I'm giving up on the NA servers soon if I keep recieving bad pings.

If you've tried the steps included in the connection guide and you're still having these problems, I strongly recommend reaching out to our tech specialists. You can do so by first gathering logs with our [Hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and Berkeley's [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1), then attaching those logs to your [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). 

Let me know if you run into any issues creating those logs or submitting a ticket.

I've done it several times, the connection guide I used months ago, and network analysis and the hextech tool reports have been sent many times with no luck. It's probably just the place I live in.

I've had hextech tool for months now, it helps when I get firewall errors though!
